scenes.text:
So, you want to know if Cocktail society is for you? You’re thinking of trying some new societies, or even just want to meet some new faces. I’ll let the cat out of the bag, that's what we're all about.

Cocktail society for us, is more of an excuse to host some super fun events and form some new friendships. Naturally, there will be both mocktails and cocktails at most of our events, but we also offer other options for those that have other preferences.
We don't have a specific day, but specific date and times for socials we run can be found on our SU page and our social media.
Our membership is £20.00 for the year! This also includes a discount card!

We've run some really fun events which included: Pizza Nights, Casino Themed Parties, Cocktail Masterclasses, a Masquerade murder mystery, Xmas cocktail party, ABBA society collaboration disco, bowling, and more...
